title: Lucio Dalla
subtitle: An overview on Lucio Dalla's life and music
curator: Miriam Longhitano, Laura Cigno, Anna Avona
description: This project will be about the most famous singer from Bologna: Lucio Dalla. He was of the best Italian singer-songwriters. As a substantial part of Italian culture, we will analyze his life and works.

dynamic_elements.text:
Lucio Dalla was one of the best singer-songwriters, composers and multi-instrumentalists. He was born in 1943 in Bologna and he died in 2012. He has delved into various musical genres. Throughout his career, which has reached fifty years of activity, he has always played the piano,the saxophone and the clarinet, instruments, the latter two, which he practiced from a very young age. His artistic production has gone through several phases: from the beat season to rhythmic and musical experimentation, up to songwriting. Also known abroad, some of his songs have been translated and brought to success in numerous languages. Among these, Caruso, has sold over 38 million copies worldwide, becoming one of the most famous Italian songs in Italy and abroad.
